adjective.definition: Fitting in well with a person's needs, activities, and plans.
adjective.example: I phoned your office to confirm that this date is convenient.
It's very convenient to pay by credit card.

noun.definition: The state of being able to proceed with something with little effort or difficulty.
noun.example: We did it for the convenience of our customers.

noun.definition: A thing that contributes to an easy and effortless way of life.
noun.example: The kitchen is equipped with all modern conveniences.

verb.definition: Come or bring together for a meeting or activity; assemble.
verb.example: He convened a meeting of the members.

usage_examples: The house is convenient to shops and schools.
Please let me know a convenient time to meet.
